name: Flower Bears
description:
Two bears want to plant a colorful garden, but are allergic to the other's flower of choice. Help them avoid some atchoos!

How to play:

Two bear friends want to plant each half of their shared garden! So be sure to plant an equal amount of both blue and yellow flowers. 

Help Yellow Bear plant Sunflowers by using WASD. Remember, he is allergic to Tulips and can't interact with them.

Help Blue Bear plant Tulips by using Arrow Keys. He can't interact with Sunflowers, it's too much pollen for him. ATCHOO.
